discourse_list.title: [ONBOARDING POLL \xf0\x9f\x9f\xa9] Add RWA-001 (6s Capital) as a Collateral Type

content.content: Dear Maker Community, It is the start of a new era in Maker–Real World Assets, one in which our Community could look forward with optimism, and excitement. A future where the possibilities are limitless and boundaries of the unknown will be explored. As we set off on this journey and adventure, I ask for your courage. I ask for your help and participation. I ask that you Vote and help RWA-001 become a reality. This is an adventure that some want, and have patiently waited for. With less than 48 hours left to Vote on the Onboarding Poll to Add RWA-001, we have had a low turnout and a few Nays. But have no fear, I believe in you Maker Community. I believe that you will decide in due time. I have faith that we will make history by launching one of the most anticipated collateral types, since the addition of MCD. In 2021 I ask that you help the Maker Community write history. Please log on to VoteMakerDAO and let’s write the first chapter together. For those who await lower Gas Tx fees–try around 21:00 UTC–you should be able to Vote on-chain for ALL 4 OnboardingPolls for $0.70 to $0.90. Don’t be cheap  penny smart, pound foolish has never been a good look. And last but not least–Thank you ALL for being apart of the Maker Community  We might not agree on everything, but together we will climb the highest mountains.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is asking for the Maker Community's help and participation in voting for the onboarding of RWA-001 as a collateral type. The post also serves as an advertisement for the proposal and extends an invitation to the community to participate in making history together.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
3rd party or author is advertising proposal

content.content: Also feel free to ask question if you are unsure what to vote. Can be done here, on PM or whatever.
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
